name: Contact Form Extended
author: Joerg Reisslein
description: Requires razorCMS 3.4.7+. Displays an extended contact form to allow people to email you directly from your website. If you need a recaptcha key, visit https://www.google.com/recaptcha/

settings.name: email
settings.label: E-Mail receiver:
settings.placeholder: Email address to send messages to

settings.name: envelopefrom
settings.label: Envelope-From:
settings.placeholder: Email address to use on envelope

settings.name: success
settings.label: Success:
settings.placeholder: Text to display when email was sent successfully
settings.value: Thank you, your message has been sent.

settings.name: error
settings.label: Error:
settings.placeholder: Text to display when an error occured
settings.value: Could not send message, please try again later.

settings.name: nohuman
settings.label: Captcha Fail:
settings.placeholder: Text to display when captcha validation fails
settings.value: You did not pass the human test, please try again.

settings.name: captchakey
settings.label: ReCaptcha Key:
settings.placeholder: your domain key for using google recaptcha services
